io.springlets.webflow.config

Class SpringletsWebFlowConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.webflow.config.AbstractFlowConfiguration
      • io.springlets.webflow.config.SpringletsWebFlowConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Configuration
public class SpringletsWebFlowConfiguration
extends org.springframework.webflow.config.AbstractFlowConfiguration
    Setup Spring MVC artifacts for Spring WebFlow. * Secure flowExecutor() bean. *
    Author:
    Enrique Ruiz at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]

    • Method Detail

      • flowExecutor

        @Bean
public org.springframework.webflow.executor.FlowExecutor flowExecutor()
        FlowExecutor bean configured with the default flow definitions provided by flowRegistry(). If you want to replace the default FlowExecutor completely, define a @Bean of that type and mark it as @Primary.
        Returns:
        the flow executor

      • flowRegistry

        @Bean
public org.springframework.webflow.definition.registry.FlowDefinitionRegistry flowRegistry()
        The default flow definitions container that scans the application classpath to load the flow definition XML files automatically. The registry base path is `classpath:templates`, that is, the flow definitions must be the templates folder. The flow location pattern used to register the flows is `/ ** / *-flow.xml`. To learn more read http://docs.spring.io/spring-webflow/docs/current/reference/htmlsingle/#flow-registry-base-path[flow location base path].

      • flowBuilderServices

        @Bean
public org.springframework.webflow.engine.builder.support.FlowBuilderServices flowBuilderServices()
        Creates the FlowBuilderServices and configures it as follows: * Set the WebFlow ConversionService that delegates on the default Spring MVC ConversionService. * Set the default Spring MVC Validator as the default Spring WebFlow Validator. * Register the StringToNullConverter. * Enable/disable flow and views cache (cache enabled by default). * View factories creator that resolve their views by loading flow-relative resources.
        Returns:
        the FlowBuilderServices

      • mvcViewFactoryCreator

        @Bean
public org.springframework.webflow.mvc.builder.MvcViewFactoryCreator mvcViewFactoryCreator()
        Creates the native Spring MVC-based views using the ajaxThymeleafViewResolver().
        Returns:
        the Spring MVC ViewFactoryCreator

      • flowHandlerMapping

        @Bean
public org.springframework.webflow.mvc.servlet.FlowHandlerMapping flowHandlerMapping()
        Spring MVC HandlerMapping that manages URL path mappings that matches the ids of registered flow definitions. Additionally register an interceptor for changing the current locale on every request
        Returns:
        the Spring MVC HandlerMapping for web flows

      • flowHandlerAdapter

        @Bean
public org.springframework.webflow.mvc.servlet.FlowHandlerAdapter flowHandlerAdapter()
        Spring MVC HandlerAdapter that encapsulates the generic workflow associated with executing flows. Set the handler adapter to pass flow output to the Spring MVC flash scope.
        Returns:
        the Spring MVC HandlerAdapter for web flows

      • ajaxThymeleafViewResolver

        @Bean
public org.thymeleaf.spring4.webflow.view.AjaxThymeleafViewResolver ajaxThymeleafViewResolver()
        Add compatibility with AJAX-based events (redirects) in Spring WebFlow
        Returns:
        the ThymeleafViewResolver
